page.title: 19CLUBS OWERSBY WMNS INSTITUTE
page.content: The Owersby and Osgodby WI has 21 mem- bers,4 from Owersby and 17 from Osgod- by.We meet every month.The first part of the evening is spent on WI business Then we welcome our speaker,who could talk about anything from growing orch- ids or icing cakes to hypnotherapy or self-defence.There is always a compet- ition,usually related to the subject of the evening and each month the best flower brought from members gardens is judged.We have provided teas at the local hort.show and other local events and entered items in the Lincs.show.We also meet members from other WIs at their own meetings or outings and at group meetings such as fashion shows and the annual carol service.One of our group is a VCO.Two ladies have been to Denman College on a walking weekend.Aged 20+ to 70+ we all enjoy our Womens Institute meetings.
